overview: Naufus Ramirez-Figueroa "Lugar de Consuelo" revisits Hugo Carrilo's 1962 play "Heart of the Scarecrow" and a censored 1975 student production of the text Ramirez-Figueroa and writer Wingston Gonzalez respond to the enduring traumas of the recent and not-so-recent past and the web of entangled inheritances, in which villains and victims mutate into each other.
title: Place of Solace
